column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLBuild a purposeful career translating science into business innovation. The goal is to empower bioscientists to create new social and economic value from research ideas, by learning the skills from entrepreneurship, technology and management that are most relevant to innovation.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
